ygData.subject: Re: Stats for a char
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess it depends how long you intend to play for. If I had my choice over again, I would put everything into STA, regardless of class. There are plenty of
ygData.messageBody:
I guess it depends how long you intend to play for. If I had my choice
over again, I would put everything into STA, regardless of class.
There are plenty of items out there that will boost a myriad of your
stats.

And, there are really no races that are superior over the other in
their classes. Equipment really make or break a class. For starters
though, the best race with overall stats IMO would be:

Enchanter - Erudite
Druid - Halfling
Warrior - Troll

Enjoy.

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., ravens_sorrows wrote:
> Hmm..ok here's a question then? Since I know that
> I will be playing within a month to two months I
> need to have a char, just in case my others are wiped
> out. So I am thinking Enchanter, Druid and yes the all
> around basher Warrior. My question is this then. When
> you start the char they ask you to put the points in,
> so what is a good distrubition of these stats for
> each char type listed here? Also for these char thypes
> what are the better races? (I know for war the best is
> Troll 'cause they get regen, but the faction sucks so I
> might just go with Human.) Hmm..can't think of anything
> else so I guess I'll go for now. *yawn* have to get up
> early for work tomorrow. Night. The Raven
